\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

  % https://q.uiver.app/#
  \begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
  X \&\& Y \&\& Z \\
  X \&\& {Y'} \&\& Z
  \arrow["a", from=1-1, to=1-3]
  \arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
  \arrow["b", from=1-3, to=1-5]
  \arrow["{\varphi }", from=1-3, to=2-3]
  \arrow["{\simeq }"', shift right, draw=none, from=1-3, to=2-3]
  \arrow[equals, from=1-5, to=2-5]
  \arrow["{a'}", from=2-1, to=2-3]
  \arrow["{b'}", from=2-3, to=2-5]
  \end{tikzcd}
  \end{document}
